languages.text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

traits.locale_text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer damage from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

languages.text:
每当装备者对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果时，都会额外施加2层效果。
当装备者{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}敌人时，目标敌人接下来每次受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，都会额外受到身上所有燃烧、流血与毒素效果造成的伤害。
languages.original_text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

traits.locale_text:
每当装备者对目标施加{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}效果{/g}时，额外施加2层效果。
此效果现在可在目标回合内，以及目标承受伤害的任何时刻时触发。

languages.text:
Накладываемые персонажем эффекты {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g} усиливаются на 2.
При каждом {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадании{/g} персонажем по противнику противник также получает {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от всех наложенных на него эффектов горения, кровотечения и отравления.
languages.original_text:
If the wearer inflicts the {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, or {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effect{/g} on a target, this target gets an additional +2 stacks of this effect.
The effects now trigger on the target's turn and also any time the target receives damage.

traits.locale_text:
Когда персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, цель получает +2 уровня этого эффекта дополнительно.
Эффект срабатывает в ход цели, а также каждый раз, когда цель получает урон.

Когда персонаж накладывает на цель {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}эффект{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравления{/g}, цель получает +2 уровня этого эффекта дополнительно.
Эффект срабатывает в ход цели, а также каждый раз, когда цель получает урон.

languages.text:
使用者が与える、全ての{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}の効果の威力が2増加する。
使用者が敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}当たる{/g}と毎回、その敵は攻撃を受けるたび、炎上、出血、毒の効果の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けるようになる。
languages.original_text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

traits.locale_text:
ターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}のいずれかの{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}効果{/g}を与えた際、効果のスタック+2
この効果は現在のターゲットのターンとターゲットがダメージを受けるごとに発動する。

languages.text:
Aumenta el poder de los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} infligidos por el portador en +2.
Cuando el portador {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacte{/g} a un enemigo, el enemigo sufrirá {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por los efectos de quemadura, hemorragia y toxina que tenga cada vez que reciba un impacto.
languages.original_text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

traits.locale_text:
Si el portador inflige el {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}efecto{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} a un objetivo, el objetivo recibe +2 acumulaciones adicionales del efecto.
Ahora los efectos se activan en el turno del objetivo y cada vez que recibe daño.

languages.text:
Die Kraft aller vom Träger verursachten {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g}-Effekte wird um +2 erhöht.
Wenn der Träger einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, erleidet dieser bei jedem Treffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch alle Verbrennen-, Blutung- und Gift-Effekten, mit denen er belegt ist.
languages.original_text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

traits.locale_text:
Verursacht der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutungs-{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennungs-{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}Effekt{/g} bei einem Ziel, erhält dieses Ziel zusätzlich +2 Stapel dieses Effekts.
Die Effekte werden nun beim Zug des Ziels ausgelöst, sowie jedes mal wenn das Ziel Schaden nimmt.

languages.text:
La puissance de tous les effets de {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g}, de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} infligés par l'utilisateur augmente de +2.
Lorsque l'utilisateur {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi, celui-ci subit désormais des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} de tous les effets de Combustion, de Saignement et de Toxine qui lui sont infligés à chaque fois qu'il est touché par une attaque.
languages.original_text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.

traits.locale_text:
Si l'utilisateur inflige l'{g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatuses}effet{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} à une cible, celle-ci reçoit +2 cumuls supplémentaires de cet effet.
Les effets se déclenchent désormais lors du tour de la cible et à chaque fois qu'elle subit des dégâts.

languages.text:
Takan kişinin yol açtığı tüm {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanma{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanama{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkilerinin gücü +2 artar.
Takan kişi, bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} o düşman artık bir saldırıya maruz kaldığında kendisine uygulanan tüm yanma, kanama ve toksin etkilerinden {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alır.
languages.original_text:
All {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} effects inflicted by the wearer have their power increased by +2.
Whenever the wearer {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} an enemy, that enemy will now suffer {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from all the burning, bleeding, and toxin effects inflicted on them every time that enemy is hit by an attack.
